-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Typeset Derivation Trees via MetaPost
--   
--   A library to typeset derivation trees via Laurent Mehats metapost
--   package. Also contains a module to ease the generation of trees for
--   (coloured) pure type systems.
@package derivation-trees
@version 0.7.3

module DerivationTrees.Basics
data LineStyle
None :: LineStyle
Simple :: LineStyle
Double :: LineStyle
Dotted :: LineStyle
Dashed :: LineStyle
Waved :: LineStyle
TeXDotted :: LineStyle
data Link

-- | Regular link
Link :: TeX -> LineStyle -> Alignment -> Int -> Link
label :: Link -> TeX
style :: Link -> LineStyle
align :: Link -> Alignment
steps :: Link -> Int

-- | Detach the derivation as another figure
Detached :: Int -> TeX -> Link
ident :: Link -> Int
label :: Link -> TeX

-- | automatic delaying
Delayed :: Alignment -> Link
align :: Link -> Alignment
defaultLink :: Link
data Alignment
LeftA :: Alignment
CenterA :: Alignment
RightA :: Alignment
newtype TeX
TeX :: String -> TeX
void :: TeX -> Bool
instance Show TeX
instance Monoid TeX
instance Show Link
instance Enum LineStyle
instance Show LineStyle
instance Show Alignment
instance IsString TeX

module DerivationTrees
brace :: TeX -> TeX
paren :: TeX -> TeX
brack :: TeX -> TeX
tex :: String -> [TeX] -> TeX
text :: String -> TeX
(!) :: TeX -> TeX -> TeX
newtype TeX
TeX :: String -> TeX
(<>) :: Monoid a => a -> a -> a
emptyDrv :: Tree k (Rule ())

-- | More compact variant
haltDrv :: TeX -> Derivation -> Derivation

-- | Used when the rest of the derivation is known.
haltDrv' :: TeX -> Derivation -> Derivation
abortDrv :: Tree t (Rule tag) -> Tree k (Rule tag)
delayPre :: Alignment -> Int -> ::> Link a -> ::> Link a
dummy :: Rule ()
rule :: TeX -> TeX -> Rule ()
type Derivation = Derivation' ()
type Premise = Link ::> Derivation' ()
data Rule tag
Rule :: tag -> LineStyle -> TeX -> TeX -> TeX -> Rule tag
tag :: Rule tag -> tag
style :: Rule tag -> LineStyle
delimiter :: Rule tag -> TeX
label :: Rule tag -> TeX
conclusion :: Rule tag -> TeX
data Figure tag
Figure :: Int -> Derivation' tag -> Figure tag
ident :: Figure tag -> Int
contents :: Figure tag -> Derivation' tag
compile :: [Figure ()] -> [String]
instance Show tag => Show (Rule tag)
instance Monoid t => Applicative (Writer t)

module DerivationTrees.ManualPTS

module DerivationTrees.CPTS
class Unifyable a
(===) :: Unifyable a => a -> a -> Bool
class TeXable a
texify :: TeXable a => a -> TeX
data V
V :: Name -> V
Unbound :: V
type Name = String
type Sort = String
type Colour = String
data Binding :: *
(:-) :: V -> Term -> Binding
Base :: Name -> Binding
Mult :: Binding -> Binding
data Term :: *
Lam :: Colour -> Binding -> Term -> Term
Pi :: Colour -> Binding -> Term -> Term
App :: Colour -> Term -> Term -> Term
Sub :: Term -> Binding -> Term
Var :: Name -> Term
Con :: Name -> Term
Sor :: Sort -> Term
Many :: Term -> Term
dS :: (Name, Term) -> Term -> Term
data Jug
Jug :: Term -> Term -> Env -> Jug
value :: Jug -> Term
typ :: Jug -> Term
env :: Jug -> Env
data Drv :: *
Ax :: Drv
St :: Sort -> Drv -> Drv
Wk :: Int -> Sort -> Drv -> Drv -> Drv
Ab :: Sort -> Drv -> Drv -> Drv
Ap :: Binding -> Drv -> Drv -> Drv
Pr :: Colour -> (Sort, Sort) -> Drv -> Drv -> Drv
Co :: Sort -> Term -> Drv -> Drv -> Drv
An :: (Derivation -> Derivation) -> Drv -> Drv
Ln :: Link -> Drv -> Drv
type Env = [Binding]
unbound :: Binding -> Bool
interpV :: V -> TeX
interpB :: Binding -> TeX
interpB' :: TeX -> Binding -> TeX
col :: Colour -> String -> [TeX] -> TeX
data Ctx
ArrowLhs :: Ctx
TopLvl :: Ctx
ColonRhs :: Ctx
BinderRhs :: Ctx
ApplLhs :: Ctx
ApplRhs :: Ctx
SubsLhs :: Ctx
havePrn :: Ctx -> Term -> Bool
interpT :: Ctx -> Term -> TeX
(+:) :: Binding -> Env -> Env
interpE :: Env -> [TeX]
renam :: Term -> TeX
interpA :: Term -> Term -> (TeX, TeX)
interpJ :: Jug -> TeX
check :: Bool -> String -> (a -> a)
bToT :: Binding -> Term
rebind :: Term -> Term -> Binding
jug' :: Term -> Sort -> Env -> Jug
stp :: Drv -> Jug -> (TeX -> Rule (), [(Drv, Jug)])
interp :: Drv -> Jug -> Derivation
delay :: Alignment -> Int -> Drv -> Drv
halt :: String -> Drv
named :: String -> Drv -> Drv
abort :: Drv
instance Show Drv
instance Show Jug
instance Eq Term
instance Show Term
instance Eq Binding
instance Show Binding
instance Eq V
instance Show V
instance TeXable Term
instance TeXable Sort
instance Unifyable Binding
instance Unifyable Term
instance Unifyable V
instance Show (a -> b)
